mapper.select: select reply_rno, board_bno, reply_writer, reply_content, reply_regDate from member_board_reply where board_bno = #{board_bno}
mapper.insert: insert into member_board_reply(board_bno, reply_writer, reply_content, reply_regDate) value(#{board_bno}, #{reply_writer}, #{reply_content}, #{reply_regDate})
mapper.select: select board_reply_rno, board_want_bno, board_want_reply_writer, board_want_reply_content, board_want_reply_regDate from member_board_want_reply where board_want_bno = #{board_want_bno}
mapper.insert: insert into member_board_want_reply(board_want_bno, board_want_reply_writer, board_want_reply_content, board_want_reply_regDate) value(#{board_want_bno}, #{board_want_reply_writer}, #{board_want_reply_content}, #{board_want_reply_regDate})
